paragraph.heading: 2Compiling
paragraph.paragraph:
To compile the example:
Start Visual Studio .NET
Choose Open Project from the File menu.
Navigate to <Eiffel_ENViSioN!_installation_path>\compiler\examples\(.net version)\gdi and select text.eifp
Clicking open loads the selected project
Launch EiffelStudio.
Select Use existing Ace (control file) and click OK
Browse to $ISE_EIFFEL\examples\dotnet\gdi_plus\text\
Choose the Ace file for the version of the .net framework you are running
Choose the directory where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the Ace file.
Click OK.
paragraph.heading: 2Running
paragraph.paragraph: After launching the application, you will see a window displayed with a similar appearance to the one above.
